Posts.Content: May 1, 2009 04:22AM temp wrote: Hi had rads in Feb 2009 for 4 weeks for DCIS after operation for high grade calification.Finding it realy hard to get back into work as a housekeeper in hotel accomadation in which I was really fit to until had rads now I get realy tired and have realy sore legs in the muscles.Went back to gp she says she cant give me anything just time.I am still not doing 8 hr days feel realy lazy have tried to push myself but end up suffering with my body really sore.It seems they all say the same thing.take care & hope it all passes soon.                     Temp
Posts.Title: Muscle/joint pain after radiation? kat06365 Larai

Posts.Content: May 5, 2009 02:56AM temp wrote:  I did have it on my left inside breast & yes they did say about my heart and also my lung but can also be affected down the track not always at the time of radition but a side effect which can affect me months or even years later,just hope this dosnt happen. Temp
Posts.Title: Muscle/joint pain after radiation? kat06365 Larai

Posts.Content: Jun 10, 2009 04:27AM temp wrote:  Had mammagram today wasnt as bad as I thought it would be, but still bit sore.The 2 week wait on results will be worse.It seems forever.I am very nervous  of the out come.Just hope I dont have to go down the track that I have just been down.But trying to stay postive.I still get really tired by the end of the week.Just want to be back normal.Doctor keeps telling me it is only time that heals,& to get over radition,still not back at work full time,just seems to be taking forever.
